data.text:
@ferayalac Dear Fernando,
Unfortunately, we are not able to provide any information concerning entry requirements. We kindly ask you to contact the embassy for further assistance.
Thank you!
Lovely greetings, 
Alessandra
@ivanroser @staralliance Dear Iván, sorry to hear you're still waiting. We kindly ask you for some more patience. Our colleagues are doing their best. Kind regards, Alessandra
@steph_whittaker Hi Stephanie, I just send you a DM. Best regards, Sandra

@JuanJosVelasq20 Furthermore, we kindly ask you to delete the last tweet of yours, as we only ask our guests to send us their booking code via PM due to data security. We apologize for the inconvenience and say thank you for understanding. 
Best regards, Shawn

data.text: @JuanJosVelasq20 [2/2]  In this case, we kindly ask you to contact our colleagues in order to assist you further. We do apologize for the inconvenience. Best regards Shawn

@JuanJosVelasq20 [1/2] Hi Juan, 
Thank you for getting in touch. We have checked your request. Unfortunately, we are not able to complete the check-in for you, as the passport information is needed for the process.
@Sheldrake Hi Philip, I'm sorry. Please send us your case reference number in a DM so we can have a closer look into this matter. Thank you. Best regards, Sandra
@onecent_ Hi there, please use a different browser or empty your cache. This might help. Kind regards, Derya
@DitonaMekaj Hi Ditona, we are sorry to hear that you have been affected by a schedule change. Is there anything we can still assist you with? Kind regards, Chris
@tootallduke Hi Fred, please be informed that the max weight for checked bags on our flights is 23kg in Economy Class and 32kg in Business Class. Kind regards, Chris
@brianvlowe Hi there, in general on Austrian Airlines flights mask obligation has been lifted. But depending on the country of origin or destination, a mask may be mandatory. Kind regards, Daphne

@pittso Hi Mike, we are sorry you still haven't got an answer yet. We know it's been a while. Right now we have a lot of inquiries. Still, we can assure you that our colleagues are doing their best to get back to you with news as soon as possible. Best regards, Christiane

@learner_startup @EaseMyTrip Hi there, the price at the airport is higher. You can contact also our customer service center. You will find the contact details via the following link: https://t.co/zMqJAzIpra Kind regards, Funda

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text: @amselj Hi Peter, please be assured that we try our best to avoid any flight irregularities or delays. In case your flight should be delayed, causing you to miss your connection, our colleagues at the airport will of course assist with an alternative. Kind regards, Chris

domain.name: TV Shows
domain.description: Television shows from around the world

entity.name: Family Guy
entity.description: Sick, twisted and politically incorrect, the animated series features the adventures of the Griffin family. Endearingly ignorant Peter and stay-at-home wife Lois reside in Quahog, R.I., and have three kids. Meg, the eldest child, is a social outcast, and teenage Chris is awkward and clueless when it comes to the opposite sex. The youngest, Stewie, is a genius baby bent on killing his mother and destroying the world. The talking dog, Brian, keeps Stewie in check while sipping martinis and sorting through his own life issues.

data.text: @NASTYARl Hi Shania, please explain what kind of confirmation you are waiting for. If you are referring to an already existing booking, please send us the booking code or travel details in a DM so we can take a closer look. Kind regards, Chris
@ivanroser @staralliance  Hi Ivan, what error message did you receive? And you haven't received your luggage yet? Kind regards, Lyndsay

@zybino Hi, the minimum connecting time is 25 minutes. This is sufficient time if you are checked in and go straight to your next gate. There is no further passport or security check. In the worst case our staff will rebook you to the next available connection Regards, Lyndsay

@imsalonichopra Hi, I totally understand your frustration and we're always trying to help our guests as good as we can. However, baggage-related topics are very specific. Have you already contacted Budapest airport? Try the contact for Lost Luggage - Celebi Ground Handling. Best regards, Sandra
@blolop_ Hi, we apologize for the delay to your luggage. Please fill in our online form for your confirmation: https://t.co/BxP4utn6f4  Kind regards, Lyndsay

urls.title: Enquiry about confirmation
urls.description: Do you have questions about a booking confirmation, or do you need additional information? Please write to us, and our team at Austrian Airlines will be happy to provide information.

data.text: @GatoxXerran Hi, we apologize that you have not received a response yet. Please send us your mail reference ID in a PM so that we can look into it for you. Kind regards, Lyndsay

@janmagrot @staralliance Hi Jan, we apologize if you have been affected by an overbooking. Please fill in our online form so that our colleagues can look into the matter: https://t.co/vp44F2Gckn  Kind regards, Lyndsay

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text: @imsalonichopra Hi there, we are really sorry about your delayed luggage. Please turn to the contact from your missing luggage report. We - the Social Media Team, can unfortunately not assist with tracking missing luggage. We kindly ask for your understanding. Kind regards, Chris
@travel_n_me Hi there, you can fill out the online contact form via desktop version here: https://t.co/GeYN2SvCfJ Kind regards, Daphne

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text: @casey_wolf_ Hi Casey, please send us your booking codes and your seat preference in a DM so we can take a closer look. Kind regards, Chris
@emmymadisonla form via desktop version here to contact them: https://t.co/gkxxiAghiq We regret that the Social Media Team can not help you further in this case. Kind regards, Daphne [3/3]

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text: @emmymadisonla Passenger Irregularity Report (PIR) which you will have received at the lost & found counter at the airport. The responsible colleagues will have all the required information. Otherwise, you can fill out the online [2/3]

@emmymadisonla Hi, we're sorry that you haven't received your luggage yet. Unfortunately, the Social Media Team has no access to any baggage systems nor to any correspondence or claims submitted by you. Please refer to the contact stated on your [1/3]

@axellsamhy1 Hi, we're sorry that you're having difficulties contacting us. Unfortunately, all our channels are busy due to the high amount of inquiries. Please try again later again. Kind regards, Daphne

@learner_startup Hi there, as you have booked your flight through a travel agency or online travel platform, we recommend that you contact this office. We can also recommend trying it late again, maybe via a different browser, or desktop version and/or delete your cache.
Best regards, Denis
@sincerecelery Hi Dan, I've just replied to your other posting. Best regards, Denis

@majermi3 [2/2] We - the Social Media Team, can unfortunately not assist with tracking missing luggage. Did you already send an email to our colleagues at centralbaggage.tracing@austrian.com? Kind regards, Derya

@majermi3 [1/2] Hi Michal, we are sorry for any frustration caused by the length of time taken to solve your issue. Due to the enormous amount of requests. There can, unfortunately, be longer waiting times.

@iiref15 Hi Reyouf, we are very sorry for any inconvenience caused by the delivery of your baggage. Please get in touch with our colleagues via the number shown on your report. We the Social Media Team can´t assist you in this case. Kind regards, Derya

@markomeco_ Hi Marko, I am sorry to hear about your delayed baggage. Have you filed a claim at the airport? If yes, you should have received a PIR-Number which will allow you to trace your baggage via the following link: https://t.co/cNQONJMTeB 
Best regards, Denis

@JDubb0217 Hi Joe, I have sent you a private message.
Best regards, Denis
@JDubb0217 Hi Joe, we are sorry to learn that your baggage hasn´t arrived with you. Please send an email to our colleagues at centralbaggage.tracing@austrian.com. Kind regards, Derya

@AnastasiaBrian9 [2/2]Please turn to the contact on your Property Irregularity Report or PIR – you’ve received the Property Irregularity Report at the Lost & Found counter at the airport, it is where all information about your case is collected.The contact person there will be glad to assist you.

@AnastasiaBrian9 [1/2] Hi Anastasia, we regret to hear that your baggage was not dully delivered and apologize for any inconvenience this has caused. Unfortunately, the Social Media Team has no access to any correspondence or claims submitted by you.

@AxellSamhy1 Hi there, thank you for reaching out. Please contact your local Austrian Service Center by selecting the dropdown menu of your country to find the telephone number: https://t.co/6bcy4Dk99W
Best regards, Denis

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text: @VaioArchontakis We're glad you liked it!
@natasha_jane18 Hi Natasha, I just replied to your PM. Best regards, Sandra
@TylerTremb Hi there, we're sorry for the inconvenience. Please send us your booking code in a Dm so we can have a closer look at it. Best regards, Christiane https://t.co/3NgZx6SOY0
@iiref15 They are confronted with a high amount of requests at the moment and this makes it difficult for them to keep the usual average responding time. Kind regards, Lyndsay [2/2]

@iiref15 Hi, we sincerely apologize to the delay to your luggage. Our colleagues are still working through a considerable backlog of luggage in Vienna and will be in touch once they locate yours. Our colleagues will reply to your claim as soon as possible. [1/2]

@VentiMochaTRex Hi there, we are very sorry about your delayed luggage. If your baggage has been missing for more than 5 days, please send the following form via vielzos@austrian.com https://t.co/YvYTtEUEyK To claim compensation, please use this form https://t.co/DlPk2wkyTE Kind regards, Chris

data.text:
@heri5ca [1/4] Hi there, 
we are sorry to hear your luggage wasn't duly delivered. Unfortunately, the Social media Team has no access to any correspondences or claims submitted by you.
@heri5ca [2/4] Please be assured that our colleagues are fully aware that people need their luggage and are working around the clock to process each bag and reunite passengers with their luggage.

@heri5ca [3/4] Unfortunately, there is currently a considerable backlog which is why it is taking longer than normal. In the meantime you can contact our colleagues via the following email address: centralbaggage.tracing@austrian.com

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text: @Cathy19062262 Hi Cathy, please send us your booking code and seat preference in a DM so we can have a closer look. Best regards, Christiane https://t.co/3NgZx6AFJS

@danwellsracing Hi Dan, we are really sorry about your delayed luggage. If your baggage has been missing for more than 5 days, please send the following form via vielzos@austrian.com https://t.co/YvYTtEUEyK Thank you for your patience and understanding. Kind regards, Chris

@kasababcia Hi Scott, Please be assured that our colleagues try their utmost to get back to everyone as fast as possible and that all requests are being answered. Unfortunately, we cannot advise a specific time frame. Thank you for your patience. Kind regards, Chris

@AlexliuIs [2/2]  Please be assured that our colleagues try their utmost to get back to everyone as fast as possible and that all requests are being answered. Unfortunately, we cannot advise a specific time frame. Thank you for your patience. Kind regards, Chris

@AlexliuIs [1/2] Hi Alex, We apologize for any inconvenience caused. However, we ask for your understanding that due to the high volume of requests, it is not possible to process all of them within the usual time limits.

@chicaktl Hi Farah, we are very sorry about your delayed luggage. If your baggage has been missing for more than 5 days, please send the following form via vielzos@austrian.com https://t.co/YvYTtEUEyK We- the social media team- can unfortunately not assist in this case. Kind regards, Chris

@tellthefactspls Hi, our colleagues will reply to you as soon as possible. They are confronted with a high amount of requests at the moment and this makes it difficult for them to keep the usual average responding time. We appreciate your continued patience. 
Best regards, Denis

@PChtrf [2/2]  or send an email to viellos@austrian.com. We - the Social Media Team, can unfortunately not assist with tracking missing luggage. We kindly ask for your understanding. Kind regards, Derya

@PChtrf [1/2]Hi, we regret to hear that your baggage was not dully delivered and apologize for any inconvenience this has caused. However, we can only ask you once again to contact our colleagues from Lost & Found via the number on your missing luggage report
@panosmessinis04 Hi there, thank you for reaching out. Please send us your booking code in a DM. We´ll gladly have a closer look into it. Kind regards, Derya https://t.co/3NgZx6SOY0

data.text: @ChDaye Hallo Christian, es tut uns leid, dass du Schwierigkeiten hattest, telefonisch mit uns in Kontakt zu treten. Sei versichert, dass meine Kollegen in München sich um dich und dein Anliegen kümmern werden, sobald es geht. Liebe Grüße, Denis

@JhonPublic Hi there, we are really sorry about your delayed luggage. Please turn to the contact from your missing luggage report. We - the Social Media Team, can unfortunately not assist with tracking missing luggage. We kindly ask for your understanding. Kind regards, Chris

@Tia_Duangdeemak Hi there, Please be informed that one piece of check-in baggage has been reserved and paid for your flights. Due to data protection reasons, we advise not to share your booking code or other personal information publicly. Kind regards, Chris

data.text: @ChDaye Hi Christian, wir entschuldigen uns für die entstandenen Unannehmlichkeiten. Leider haben wir vom Social Media Team keinen Zugang zum Gepäckssystem und können dich daher nur erneut ersuchen die zuständigen KollegInnen direkt zu kontaktieren. Freundliche Grüße, Chris
@chdaye Ansonsten kannst du gern unser Kontaktformular ausfüllen: https://t.co/Yv644ofc3b Liebe Grüße, Daphne [2/2]

urls.title: Hilfe & Kontakt
urls.description: Sie haben Fragen rund um Ihre Reservierungen, Ihren Flug oder Ihr Gepäck? Kontaktieren Sie uns über unser Kontaktformular.Wir helfen Ihnen gerne weiter.

data.text: @chdaye Hallo Christian, es tut uns leid, dass du dein Gepäck nicht erhalten hast. Bitte kontaktiere direkt die zuständigen KollegInnen. Die Telefonnummer findest du auf deinem Passenger Irregularity Report. [1/2]

@sinjinis Hi, unfortunately, the Social Media Team, has no access to any baggage systems nor to any claims submitted by you. Please refer to the contact stated on your missing luggage report.   Kind regards, Daphne
@OrnaBerry Hi Orna, we kindly ask you to remove the posted pictures as it contains your personal data. Kind regards, Daphne
@Veenie66 @staralliance Hi Vanessa, I've just replied to your other posting. Best regards, Denis

@majermi3 Hi Michael, I am very sorry to hear that your baggage is still missing. We are sorry for any inconvenience this has caused. I keep my fingers crossed that you will be reunited with your baggage soon. Kind regards, Derya
@keyshanna13 Hi there, we have answered you on your other post. Kind regards, Daphne

@gb_baseball Hi there, we are really sorry about your delayed luggage. Please turn to the contact from your missing luggage report. We - the Social Media Team, can unfortunately not assist with tracking missing luggage. We kindly ask for your understanding. Kind regards, Chris

@salosutton Hi there, we apologize for any inconvenience caused. If your baggage has been missing for more than 5 days, please send the following form via vielzos@austrian.com https://t.co/YvYTtEU6Jc  Kind regards, Chris

@armhambaryan3 Hi Armine, We apologize for any inconvenience caused. If your baggage has been missing for more than 5 days, please send the following form via vielzos@austrian.com https://t.co/YvYTtEU6Jc Kind regards, Chris

@xeniagj Hi Xenia, we are really sorry about your delayed luggage. Please turn to the contact from your missing luggage report. We - the Social Media Team, can unfortunately not assist with tracking missing luggage. We kindly ask for your understanding. Kind regards, Chris

@sofies_world Hi Sofie, we are really sorry about your delayed luggage. Please turn to the contact from your missing luggage report. We - the Social Media Team, can unfortunately not assist with tracking missing luggage as we do not have access to the baggage system. Kind regards, Chris

@salosutton [2/2] you must've received a "PIR (Passenger Irregularity Report)" with a contact to reach for updates. Please continue to refer to the responsible colleagues from the PIR Report for any potential queries. Best regards, Christiane

@salosutton [1/2] Hi Salo, we’re sincerely sorry to hear that your luggage wasn't duly delivered. Unfortunately, the Social Media Team has no information about your submitted lost or delayed luggage claim. When you reported your missing bags

@gerdachristiaan Hi Gerda, please refer to the contact stated on your missing luggage report. Otherwise, you can contact the responsible colleagues via the online form: https://t.co/gkxxiAghiq Please open the link in desktop version. Kind regards, Daphne

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text: @go_diani Hi there, As this booking has been made by a travel agency and as the issuing office is always responsible for the administration of the booking we kindly ask you to contact your travel agency directly regarding any changes or rebooking requests. Kind regards, Chris

@GaloreJas Hi Jas, did you fill out our online form regarding a possible refund and compensation already? If so, please send us the reference number in a DM so we can investigate further. Kind regards, Chris
@Rafi_Farkas Hi there, as soon as we have any new information regarding this matter you will be informed via our homepage or our Social Media channels. Kind regards, Chris

@daisydoesnails @cyprus_police Dear Daisy, I'm sorry to read that you miss some items from your luggage. Please follow this link https://t.co/Ijw5CsLWdU to receive more information on how to report the missing items. Best regards, Sandra

urls.title: FAQ Baggage
urls.description: Here you can find frequently asked questions and answers about the topic of baggage.

data.text:
@go_diani Hello there,
If you require assistance with the rebooking, kindly contact our reservation helpline under this number:
+43 51766 1000
You can find the worldwide phone numbers under the following link https://t.co/YRTi6bIUO2
Kind regards,
Alessandra

data.text: @zkaimakliotis Hi Zack, We apologize for any inconvenience caused. If your baggage has been missing for more than 5 days, please send the following form via vielzos@austrian.com https://t.co/YvYTtEU6Jc Kind regards, Chris

data.text: @carotrevino1 [1/2] Hi Caro, We apologize for any inconvenience caused. Of course, we will partly reimburse you for any expenses you had due to the missing baggage. In accordance with regulations, we will cover 50% of your expenses for clothes and 100% for cosmetic products.
@anna_fiereder Hi Anna, we kindly ask for your understanding that the additional fast track service is currently not offered in London Heathrow. Kind regards, Chris

@fb75015 Hi there, We apologize for any inconvenience caused. If your baggage has been missing for more than 5 days, please send the following form via vielzos@austrian.com https://t.co/YvYTtEU6Jc Kind regards, Chris
@BeataGorecka [2/2] If your baggage has been missing for more than 5 days, please send the following form via vielzos@austrian.com https://t.co/YvYTtEUEyK Kind regards, Chris

@danwellsracing [2/2] you must've received a "PIR (Passenger Irregularity Report)" with a contact to reach for updates. Please refer to the responsible colleagues from the PIR Report for any potential queries. Best regards, Christiane

@danwellsracing [1/2] Hi Dan, we’re sincerely sorry to hear that your wife's luggage wasn't duly delivered. Unfortunately, the Social Media Team has no access to any correspondence or claims submitted by you. When you reported your missing bag

@viktoriyascret Hi Viktoriya, I do understand your frustration and your anger. To bring your request to notice I would kindly ask you to fill out our online form on https://t.co/rsllbQy1bS
Best regards, Denis
